    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AbstractDAO<T>
    A generic abstract class that provides basic CRUD operations for any type T.
    Bill
    An immutable record respresenting a finalized bill for a placed order.
    BillBLL
    Handles reading of all bill records from the log.
    BillDAO
    Data access object for bill records.
    BillPanel
    GUI panel for viewing all the generated bills.
    Client
    Represents a client in the system.
    ClientBLL
    Business Logic Layer for Client operations.
    ClientDAO
    DAO class for performing operations on Client objects.
    ClientPanel
    GUI panel for displaying and managing clients.
    ConnectionFactory
    Manages database connections using a singleton pattern.
    Main
    Entry point of the Order Management application.
    MainFrame
    Main GUI frame for the Order Management app.
    OrderBLL
    Business Logic Layer for Orders.
    OrderDAO
    DAO class for performing operations on Order objects.
    OrderPanel
    GUI panel for placing order between clients and products.
    Orders
    Represents an order placed by a client for a specific product.
    Product
    Represents a product that can be ordered.
    ProductBLL
    Business Logic Layer for Product operations.
    ProductDAO
    DAO class for performing operations on Product objects.
    ProductPanel
    GUI panel for displaying and managing products.
    Status
    Represents the soft-deletion status of entities like Client or Product.
    TableGenerator<T>
    Utility class to generate a JTable dynamically from a list of objects.
    ValidationUtils
    Utility class for validating user input fields such as email, phone, and empty strings.
